00024 class SMSTPDUContainer {
00027       uint8 *pnext;
00028 
00032       uint8 data[160];
00033 
00044          uint8 m_payLoad[160];
00045          
00049          int   m_payLoadSize;
00050          
00054          char m_serviceCenter[50];
00058          char m_recipientPhone[50];
00060 
00061    public:
00064       enum {
00065          SMS_(SCA_ADDRESS_TYPE     ) = 0x91,
00066          SMS_(TP_MESSAGE_TYPE      ) = 0x11,
00067          SMS_(TP_MESSAGE_TYPE_HI   ) = 0x51,
00068          SMS_(TP_MESSAGE_REFERENCE ) = 0x00,
00069          SMS_(DEST_ADDRESS_TYPE    ) = 0x91,
00070          SMS_(MESSAGE_TP_PID       ) = 0x00,
00071          SMS_(MESSAGE_TP_DCS        ) = 0x00,
00072          SMS_(MESSAGE_TP_VP        ) = 0xA7,
00073          SMS_(INFO_ELEMENT_ID      ) = 0x06,
00074          SMS_(EL_INSERT_TYPE_INFORMATION ) = 0x03,
00075       };
00076 
00077 
00085       SMSTPDUContainer(uint8 *pPayload,
00086                        size_t nPayloadSize = 0,
00087                        const char *sRxPhone = "",
00088                        const char *sServiceCenter = "")
00089        {
00090           strcpy(m_recipientPhone, sRxPhone);
00091           strcpy(m_serviceCenter, sServiceCenter);
00092           memcpy(m_payLoad, pPayload, nPayloadSize);
00093           pnext = data;
00094           m_payLoadSize = nPayloadSize;
00095           // Move this following one to getMessageAsHex.
00096           makeMessage(pPayload, nPayloadSize, sRxPhone, sServiceCenter);
00097        }
00098 
00104       SMSTPDUContainer(char* hexData);
00105 
00112       int getMessageAsHex(char* hexData, size_t maxLength);
00113 
00122       const char* getPhoneNumber() const {
00123          return m_recipientPhone;
00124       }
00125 
00133       const char* getServiceCenterNumber() const {
00134          return m_serviceCenter;
00135       }
00136 
00141       int getPayloadSize() const {
00142          return m_payLoadSize;
00143       }
00144 
00149       const uint8* getPayload() const {
00150          return m_payLoad;
00151       }

00180                          int len);
00181 
00182   protected:
00185       void   reset() {
00186          pnext = data;
00187       }
00188 
00189   public:
00192       size_t count(void) {
00193          return pnext - data;
00194       }
00195       
00198       size_t countFree(void) {
00199          return sizeof(data) - count();
00200       }
00201 
00202   protected:
00205       uint8* position(void) {
00206          return pnext;
00207       }

00211       SMSTPDUContainer& operator<<(uint8 n) {
00212          *pnext++ = n;
00213          // assert(pnext - data < (int)sizeof(data));
00214          return *this;
00215       }
